description: This Python script demonstrates the integration of Agno's MCP with Mem0 to build a personalized code reviewer. It sets up an asynchronous agent that reviews code snippets and provides feedback, with example usage included.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with tools and a language model to perform code review tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used by the agent for generating responses.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: Provides tools for interacting with the Mem0 MCP server within the agent.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes the agent with a message and prompts it to review code.
